name: Delhi Research Implementation and Innovation (DRIIV)
interests: Delhi Research Implementation and Innovation (DRIIV), addresses educational, environmental and societal problems pertinent to Delhi and neighbouring regions; imncluding but not limited to Effective Education, Solid Waste Management, Water Security, Air Pollution, application of AI/ML in Healthcare and Sustainable Mobility.

name: Delhi Effective Education and Pedagogy Cluster (DEEP-C)
interests: One part of DRIIV is the Delhi Effective Education and Pedagogy Cluster (DEEP-C) where we aim to improve learners' competencies in analytical, critical thinking, problem-solving, and inquiry skills and introduce students/trainers to the current fields of research and innovation to enhance their employability skills in the long run.

name: Finovista
interests: Finovista is a Program Management Agency located in New Delhi, India. As an In-country Representative, we specialize in a range of Capacity Building Programs, including Innovation Challenge, Entrepreneurship Development Program, Investor Pitching & Connect, and Training.

name: Wikimedia
interests: Wikimedia is a global movement whose mission is to bring free educational content to the world. Through various projects, chapters, and the support structure of the non-profit Wikimedia Foundation, Wikimedia strives to bring about a world in which every single human being can freely share in the sum of all knowledge.

name: Cactus Communications
interests: We are a science communication and technology company. We specialize in AI products and solutions that improve how research gets funded, published, communicated, and discovered.

name: Transforming India's Green Revolution by Research and Empowerment for Sustainable food Supplies (TIGR2ESS)
interests: TIGR2ESS is a large-scale project drawing together partners from research, industry, government and NGOs in the UK and India.

name: Indian National Young Academy of Science (INYAS)
interests: We are a science communication and technology company. We specialize in AI products and solutions that improve how research gets funded, published, communicated, and discovered.

name: Knowledge Augmentation through Research in Young Aspirants(KARYA-DST)
interests: S&T Council has initiated a program KARYA (Knowledge Augmentation through Research in Young Aspirants) for providing an opportunity to science undergraduates and postgraduates to work upon shortcomings research problem for 8 weeks at premier institutes.

name: Focus Area Science Technology Summer Fellowship(FAST-SF)
interests: With a view to enhance the spread of Science and Technology in the specific regions of the country, the Inter Academy Panel has initiated the Focus Area Science Technology Summer Fellowship [FAST-SF]

name: IAS-INSA-NASI Summer Research Fellowship
interests: The three national Science Academies offer several two-month Summer Fellowships to enable students/teachers (studying/teaching in India) to work with scientists associated with the three Academies during 2023.
